loading_scraped_content: We are loading some scraped content to facilitate the configuration of data cleaning
loading_error: There was an error loading the scraped data
sweeper_result_intro: With this cleaner, your data will be transformed into:
add_first_sweeper: Select a sweeper to start cleaning the data scraped
add_more_sweepers: Add more sweepers to clean you data
select_sweeper_placeholder: Select a way to clean your data
replace_char_label: Replace a char with another one
pad_label: Add a prefix and/or a suffix

remove_char.title: Remove a character
remove_char.remove_at_index_label: What is the place of the character to be removed ?

replace_char.title: Replace a character
replace_char.replaced_input_label: What is the character you want to replace ?
replace_char.replaced_by_input_label: What is the character to put instead?

pad_chars.title: Prefix / Suffix data
pad_chars.prepend_placeholder: Enter any character to prefix the content
pad_chars.append_placeholder: Enter any character to suffix the content

regex.title: Regular Expression (Regex)
regex.label: Python Regex
regex.intro: The data is going to be scraped with a software written in python, that's why you need to enter here a valid python regex. Use a Regex testing tool like Regex101.com to validate your regex
regex.outro: The effect of this cleaner cannot be previewed
